item.title: The BNI business referral system has the potential to yield significant returns
item.description: Sukri Kadola, the founder and CEO of Singapore’s Bloem Singapore, a boutique and floral design house, has taken on a new role as President of the BNI Apex chapter. This chapter is part of the BNI business network, known for its referral system. Kadola highlights the success of this system, reporting that BNI Apex has closed approximately S$6 million in business since 2012 through referrals. Source: Bloem. Kadola.Â Kadola emphasizes the value of BNI’s network, stating that it provides a platform for members to connect, support each other, and generate business opportunities through referrals.
